misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face at Kurk Golf, is set to mark his twelfth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. A competitor since the inaugural event, Marcus brings a wealth of experience to the greens.

Known for his thoughtful approach to the game, Marcus has yet to clinch the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy. However, his dedication and strategic play make him a formidable opponent in every match.

Off the course, Marcus is known for his complex and introspective nature. He has, on occasion, been known to express his more feminine side by participating in tournaments under the guise of his alter ego, "Eva". Whether as Marcus or Eva, his presence is always felt, and his sportsmanship is commendable.
